bb.desc: 15 combo Thunder attack on all foes (damage relative to remaining HP, boosts own critical rate), probable 3 turns critical, elemental and spark vulnerability infliction, restores HP, may raise allies from KO, may activate BB/SBB/UBB twice for 3 turns & fills OD gauge
bb.name: Lightningspeed

dbb.desc: 46 combo grand dual attack on all foes (damage relative to remaining HP), boosts Atk, Def, Rec, critical hit rate, BB Atk, fills BB, fully restores HP, Spark damage boosts BB gauge, adds status ailment infliction to attack, inflicts Atk, Def reduction, 100% raises allies from KO & activates BB/SBB/UBB twice
dbb.name: Hypercharge

dictionary.description:
Forming the elite of the technologically advanced military organization known as Rezcorps, Volpers are deployed in pairs along with a small squadron of rank-and-file guardsmen to neutralize threats within the urban landscapes of Paskua.

A rising star among their ranks, Lleva has the honor of being one of the most talented boltstrikers on the force. The boltblade she wields channels ambient static in the air and concentrates them into an electric burst capable of stunning or short circuiting mechanical opponents—an ideal counter against renegade robots, the preferred minions of urban threats.

It might have been a grim coincidence that Lleva and her partner Buck were assigned to oversee the interrogation of Vikki, a self-proclaimed "evil genius" who was able to send one of her lackeys to another world. It seemed like only yesterday when Lleva was just a cadet in the academy along her friend and rival Bonnie when they had heard of a talented mind within the field of robotics...

Now, as she stood stoic before the heavy lamp, Lleva almost felt sorry for the slight figure on the other side of the table—save for Vikki's self-satisfied grin. There was a job to be done, and Lleva prided herself on completing any mission set out for her. That was why she succeeded where Bonnie had left; Bonnie who was always too much of a firebrand. Bonnie, who had visited Vikki before disappearing.

Clearing her throat, Lleva began the interrogation. She would get to the bottom of this mysterious business, and when she finally pulled Bonnie out of what was certain to be some harebrained scheme, she would have choice words for her.
dictionary.evolution: Y'know, it would be a lot cooler if Bonnie were here to see it, but I guess she's always got her head up in that big old cannon of hers.
dictionary.fusion:
Oh, thanks.
Not gonna say no to a little pick-me-up.
dictionary.summon:
Rezcorps Volper reporting. The name is Lleva.
My partner has all the deets,
but if you're ready to go, so am I.

extra skill.desc: 150% Thunder elemental damage when Buck or Bonnie is in squad or Atk boosting Sphere is equipped, 25% critical damage for all allies, fills BB gauge each turn, negates all status ailments and Atk, Def, Rec reduction & add to BB/SBB (Removes all status ailments and Atk, Def, Rec reduction)
extra skill.name: Enhanced Boltblade

sbb.desc: 17 combo Thunder attack on all foes (damage relative to remaining HP, boosts own critical rate), 13 combo Thunder attack on single foe (or probable 5% damage of foes' max HP), probable 3 turns Atk, Def reduction infliction, boosts Atk, Def, Rec and critical rate (Thunder) for 3 turns, boosts spark damage for 3 turns & boosts critical damage (Thunder) for 3 turns
